flextable theme for styling tables for NAFO docuemtns

Source: R/tables.R
theme_nafotabs.Rd

A modification of flextable::theme_booktabs

theme_nafotabs(x, fontsize = 11, fontname = "Cambria")

Arguments

x

A flextable object

fontsize

Font size

fontname

Font family

Examples


library(flextable)
d <- data.frame(SSB = rlnorm(10), Recruitment = rlnorm(10))
flextable(d) %>%
  theme_nafotabs()
